amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase NASA's high-performance computing and communications program by $35 million and earmark $22 million for information infrastructure technology and applications.
amendment.purpose: An amendment printed in the Congressional Record of October 10 as amendment No. 7, to increase funding by $35 million for the NASA High Performance Computing Communication Program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 144 - 276 (Roll no. 702).
